oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Parody
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Civil War; music; poetry;
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: "Parody on 'Columbia the Gem of the Ocean'": ballad written by Mrs. Chalineau of Pine Bluff, AR, to commemorate the bravery of the Confederate soldiers who fought along the Saline River in central Arkansas against General Steele's advance.
oai_dc:dc.dc:contributor: Manuscript collection processed by John Jones
